title: Reject non-Sendable objc_nonisolated actor-member boundaries in strict concurrency lowering

diagnostics.message: objc_nonisolated member parameters and returns must be Sendable-like in strict concurrency mode

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: nonisolated actor-member boundary sendability checks run before callable entry-thunk emission
non-Sendable parameter and result types on objc_nonisolated members are rejected in strict concurrency mode
rejected declarations do not produce boundary metadata that can be consumed as valid cross-domain contracts

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized lowering preserves strict-concurrency nonisolated boundary sendability rejection
optimization does not bypass boundary sendability checks for objc_nonisolated members
diagnostic behavior for invalid nonisolated boundary types remains equivalent to -O0

abi_field_stability.stability_property: strict-concurrency lowering rejects objc_nonisolated boundaries that cannot satisfy sendable boundary contracts
